dict.string: Play the matching pairs card game

## Usage
Play the [matching pairs game](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Concentration_%28card_game%29) via the `memory` keyword.
![Starting the workflow](images/about/keyword.png)
![Playing the game](images/about/grid.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> Reveal card. * <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Start new game.
Increase the difficulty and change the set of images in the [Workflow’s Configuration](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/user-configuration/).
Grab a fixed number of images
With the "Custom..." collection, you can use any images folder. Will not be included when playing "Random".
